result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Regina S Peter

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Regina S Peter in court with attorney Pamela L. Popken.  Thomas Jerome Coaty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
State moves to DRI the charges.
BTC: Case DRI, apply bond to 14CM2475.
Pre-Trial Conference and Order/case adjourned off the record.

Defendant Regina S Peter in court with attorney Sean Michael Brown.  Thomas Jerome Coaty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
Deft's chapter 51 has been held open for a period of time.
Deft has started an outpatient program.
Deft to complete treatment at the end of May.
Def moves to w/draw.
BTC: Motion to w/draw granted, new atty to be appointed.  Status conference scheduled for June 1, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Regina S Peter in court with attorney Sean Michael Brown.  Thomas Jerome Coaty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
Matter is scheduled for bond review on Def's motion.
Def moves to modify conditions of bond in regards to SCRAM.
State does not object.
BTC: Modify bond to allow intensive monitoring with Testing of 3 times per week.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions: ***3-17-15 MODIFY CONDITIONS OF BOND TO ALLOW SCRAM UNIT TO STAY REMOVED. DEFT MUST BE TESTED AT LEAST 3 TIMES PER WEEK***  ***2-16-15 MODIFY BOND TO REMOVE THE SCRAM UNIT, DEFT MUST GIVE TREATMENT FACILITY AUTHORIZATION TO NOTIFY ZCI OF ANY VIOLATIONS.***   It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any  alcohol.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.  The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Defendant is ordered to have SCRAM unit installed and monitored by Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) - 524 S. Main Street, 3rd floor (262-632-1780.  $208 advanced fee for installment of SCRAM must be paid prior to release from jail.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Regina S Peter in court with attorney Sean Michael Brown.  Christopher D. Steenrod for Tom Coaty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
Deft has gotten accepted into a program.
Def has filed a motion to remove the SCRAM unit in 15CM61.
State has some concerns but will not object to the removal or SCRAM.
BTC: Motion to modify bond granted, modify bond to remove the SCRAM unit, but must authorize the treatment facility to notify ZCI of any violations.  Status conference scheduled for April 20, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:***2-16-15 MODIFY BOND TO REMOVE THE SCRAM UNIT, DEFT MUST GIVE TREATMENT FACILITY AUTHORIZATION TO NOTIFY ZCI OF ANY VIOLATIONS.***   It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any  alcohol.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.  The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Defendant is ordered to have SCRAM unit installed and monitored by Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) - 524 S. Main Street, 3rd floor (262-632-1780.  $208 advanced fee for installment of SCRAM must be paid prior to release from jail.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Regina S Peter in court with attorney Sean Michael Brown.  Christopher D. Steenrod for Tom Coaty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
Deft has been accepted into an AODA treatment facility.
The facility is located in Milwaukee.
The program is about a 1 year long.
Def is requesting a bond hearing date.
BTC: Date set.  Status conference scheduled for February 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Payment received through Government Payment Express (charge card agency) - $958.00 13413340 bond + scram fee
While treated as being paid immediately, actual posting of payment will occur within 5-10 business days.
Status conference on January 26, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:   It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any  alcohol.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.  The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Defendant is ordered to have SCRAM unit installed and monitored by Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) - 524 S. Main Street, 3rd floor (262-632-1780.  $208 advanced fee for installment of SCRAM must be paid prior to release from jail.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Regina S Peter in court with attorney Mindy M. Nolan.  Defendant Regina S Peter in custody.  Eric P. Guttenberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Mark Garvin.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Status conference scheduled for January 26, 2015 at 08:30 am.
